name: 王謹誠
objective:
本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本數值方法、求解拋物線方程式、求解橢圓方程式、求解雙曲線方程式。
This course comprises four parts. Part.I are basics of numerical methods. Part.II is the application of solving parabolic equations. Part.III is the application of solving elliptic equations. Part 4 is the application of solving hyperbolic equations.

第 05 週 Basics of Numerical Methods

第 08 週 Parabolic Equations 
第 09 週 Midterm 期中報告

第 11 週 Elliptic Equations
第 12 週 Elliptic Equations
第 13 週 Hyperbolic Equations 
第 14 週 Hyperbolic Equations 
第 15 週 Hyperbolic Equations 
第 16 週 Application to Convection-Diffusion Equation 
第 17 週 Application to Convection-Diffusion Equation 
第 18 週 Final Exam 期末考試
